channel.title: The attack option [delta]
channel.description:
I am currently trying to add dueling to my server, but i cant seem to get the attack option upon accepting the duel. I've already added the dueling arena to the wilderness.
any help is appreciated.
thanks!

item.title: The attack option [delta]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“mikeydsss, post:1, topic:439481”]I am currently trying to add dueling to my server, but i cant seem to get the attack option upon accepting the duel. I’ve already added the dueling arena to the wilderness.

any help is appreciated.

thanks![/quote]

Can you explain in more detail what you have added. To me it seems you just added a “duel option” from the wilderness in hopes of getting an attack option? have you actually added anything at all yet?

Read full topic
